ygData.subject: clock problems associated with game
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I have this problem with Gladiator messing up my computer s clock. Before I start playing the game, the clock is set exactly so many minutes ahead of real

Subject: clock problems associated with game

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

Ok, I have this problem with Gladiator messing up my computer's clock. 
 Before I start playing the game, the clock is set exactly so many 
minutes ahead of real time.  When I play a while with the game, the 
clock is even further ahead of real time when I look at it.  All other 
programs do NOT cause this.  I have traced it down to the game 
Gladiator.  I have been meaning to ask about this.  Can anyone explain 
why the game messes with the computer clock?  I upgraded from Windows 
3.1 to Win95, if that helps.  Am I the only way out there with this 
problem?
